title: Buck Rogers Comic Strips and Short Stories
description:
Buck Rogers Newspaper Strips, and Short Stories:
1.  Amazing Stories - Aug 1928 and March 1929 - First 2 Buck Rogers Stories
2.  Buck Rogers in the 25th Century Short Story
3.  Buck Rogers - Golden Princes of Mars (Sunday Newspaper Strip # 1) 1930
4.  Buck Rogers - Fish Men of Planet X (Sunday Newspaper Strip # 2) 1930
5.  Buck Rogers - Mysterious Saturian (Sunday Newspaper Strip # 3) 1930
6.  Buck Rogers - Marooned on Venus (Sunday Newspaper Strip # 4) 1931
